meanings.definition: The occurrence of different alleles at a particular locus in different individuals of the same species.
meanings.sent1: Allotypy can lead to variations in physical traits among members of a species.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use allotypy to understand how genes influence diversity within a group of animals.
meanings.sent3: The concept of allotypy makes genetics class more interesting.
meanings.sent4: In a forest of allotypy, each tree represents a unique genetic makeup.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful diagrams to explain allotypy to the students.

meanings.definition: The study of genetic variation within a species.
meanings.sent1: Allotypy helps researchers explore the differences in DNA among individuals of the same kind.
meanings.sent2: The field of allotypy is crucial for understanding the genetic diversity in populations.
meanings.sent3: Learning about allotypy can be as exciting as solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The world of genetics is a vast ocean where allotypy is a tiny but essential island.
meanings.sent5: Through allotypy, scientists unlock the secrets of genetic differences in species.
